articles.title: Covid third wave: Americans 'scared and angry' as pandemic worsens - BBC News
articles.description: As the Delta variant causes a rethink about risk, Americans are battling to keep a feeling of normalcy.
articles.content:
By Marianna BradyBBC News, Washington
Americans are feeling a sense of whiplash as leaders scramble to account for a surge in Covid cases and a rise in hospital admissions.
